parameters: \."Now I'm gonna make you admit that me,
right here... I'm the real Reko!!"
"No, you must have been apart for
at least as long as Alice has been in prison!"
\."That's plenty of time for a person to change!!"
had an impact on Reko's psyche!!"
\."You got no proof, and ain't that rude?!
he could tell that by intuition!!"
\."Ты правда собираешься отрицать все те годы,
которые мы с ним провели вместе?!"
\."You could only get the Web of Happiness in there!
Since you're holding it, you went in!"
\."I just got it from the Reko who left the room!
\."Then show me some proof you weren't in there!"
"You took most of the Clear Chips
we got in the Room of Lies, Reko!!"
\."If we had gone in together and split it equally,
that would mean evenly sharing the Clear Chips too!!"
'Cause we went in the Room of Lies together!!"
"You said before you had no memory of it!!"
\."That was an act!.. I was being questioned,
so I feigned ignorance on reflex!!"
I'm sorry... for breaking the monitor!!.."
from the Reko who broke the monitor!)
\.\C[4](But... I can't mount an attack like this!!)
and care for others the real Reko has!"
when she heard what you were saying!!"
\."I'm clumsy!.. I was in a panic...
\."Deep down, I don't want people to hate me!
getting shards lodged in her fist!!"
but it was just a light wound!"
"There's hardly any fat on your hands!
A piercing injury would have to be deep!!"
Give it up already! Who are you?!"
\.\C[4](Urgh! She won't admit it if I just bluff!..)
"No, I can only imagine you're someone in disguise!"
\."And Ranger, the one with the most similar build...
It just means I'm the real deal!!"
"That's right! So long as a disguise is impossible,
\."H-Huh?! Ain't that a little too anything-goes?!"
"anything-goes" than Miley! If it would trouble us,
there a non-zero chance they'd do it!"
we haven't met has replaced me as a faker..."

\."Hmph... You're gonna say some shit like

It's... the worst case I can imagine...)
\."Wha?! What are you getting at, Sara?!"
\.\C[3]The next one will be the last.
\."You don't... have to shoulder any more, Sara!.."
\."Was she... was she really, definitely a fake?!.."
\."Look at the corpse, you'll be able to tell!"
\."As if I could look... at the corpse!!.."
\.\C[3]I looked down at the fallen Reko.
\.\C[3]She looked nothing but real to me.
\.\C[3]Even if she was a doll... that was Reko.
\."...Look at that. She really was a doll."
\."But then... Where is the real Reko?.."
our Impression Room finally sank back to the ground.

It might make the poison spread more...)
\.\C[4](All I can do is keep shouting...)
Gin will be fine with the antidote."
Reko... We're going to search for Reko!"
\."She's right... Keiji and me'll help Gin.
